GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.15.20
GSD.description:
PCI: pciehp: Fix infinite loop in IRQ handler upon power fault

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.20 by commit 1db58c6584a72102e98af2e600ea184ddaf2b8af, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 8edf5332c39340b9583cf9cba659eb7ec71f75b5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: PCI: pciehp: Fix infinite loop in IRQ handler upon power fault
